name: @balancer-labs/v2-deployments
description: Addresses and ABIs of all Balancer V2 deployed contracts

scripts.compile: tsc && npx hardhat compile && rm -rf artifacts/build-info
scripts.check: npm run check-artifacts && npm run check-deployments
scripts.check-deployments: npx hardhat check-deployments --network mainnet && npx hardhat check-deployments --network polygon && npx hardhat check-deployments --network arbitrum && npx hardhat check-deployments --network optimism && npx hardhat check-deployments --network goerli && npx hardhat check-deployments --network gnosis && npx hardhat check-deployments --network bsc && npx hardhat check-deployments --network avalanche
scripts.check-action-ids: npx hardhat check-action-ids --network mainnet && npx hardhat check-action-ids --network polygon && npx hardhat check-action-ids --network arbitrum && npx hardhat check-action-ids --network optimism && npx hardhat check-action-ids --network gnosis && npx hardhat check-action-ids --network bsc && npx hardhat check-action-ids --network avalanche
scripts.build-address-lookup: npx hardhat build-address-lookup --network mainnet && npx hardhat build-address-lookup --network polygon && npx hardhat build-address-lookup --network arbitrum && npx hardhat build-address-lookup --network optimism && npx hardhat build-address-lookup --network goerli && npx hardhat build-address-lookup --network gnosis && npx hardhat build-address-lookup --network bsc && npx hardhat build-address-lookup --network avalanche
scripts.lint: npm run lint:solidity && npm run lint:typescript
scripts.test: npm run build && npx hardhat test ./**/test/*.ts
